section.heading: Abolishment of the Department of Human Rights and Local Business Development.
section.text: Pursuant to § 1-204.04(b), the Council hereby abolishes the Department of Human Rights and Local Business Development, established under Reorganization Plan No. 1 of 1989, effective November 1, 1989. The Department of Human Rights and Local Business Development is abolished as of October 1, 1999.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90-day) addition of subchapter IV, see notes following § 2-1411.01.
